channel.title: Lol how do i make this a safe zone
channel.description: how do i make my new ::home2 a safe zone btw its in varrock squre and i dunno how to make it safe it just says wild and ppl can attack[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 23, 2009, 02:20:31 pm[/size][hr]??

item.title: Lol how do i make this a safe zone
item.dc:creator: @Mercifies Mercifies
item.description:
@Mercifies wrote:

Go into client.java and search (Ctrl+F)

    public boolean nonWild() {

Then go and find the coords of the area you want to make safe, and put them here. Make a new line and insert your codes.

		|| (absX >= COORDX && absX <= 2COORDX && absY >= COORDY && absY <= 2COORDY)

Your first coord X will go to the second making everything in the area safe, and the first coord Y will go the 2nd coord Y and make everything safe in that area, and also everything between the 2 Y points and the 2 X points.

Read full topic
item.source: Lol how do i make this a safe zone
